abstract: Wall Street struggled to hold onto its weeklong winning streak on Monday as stocks faltered in late trading on weakness in the technology sector.
snippet: Wall Street struggled to hold onto its weeklong winning streak on Monday as stocks faltered in late trading on weakness in the technology sector.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street’s four-day buying spree stalled on Monday as stocks gave up strong early gains and closed slightly lower.

headline.main: Wall Street Falters Late in the Day
headline.print_headline: Wall Street Falters Late in Trading Day
